pkgmetadata.longdescription: Utilities and Design Aids for Up-and-Down Dose-Finding Studies // Up-and-Down is the most popular design approach for dose- finding, but has been severely under-served by the statistical computing community. This is the first package to address Up- and-Down's needs. For a recent methodological tutorial on Up- and-Down, see Oron et al. (2022) doi:10.1097/ALN.0000000000004282.
